title: Lazy Nvim
description: Lazy Nvim is a plugin that allows you to load plugins on demand. It is a great way to speed up your startup time.

title: Language Server Protocol
description: The Language Server protocol is used to integrate programming languages into editors and IDEs. It is used by VSCode, Vim, Emacs, and many more.

title: Nvim Treesitter
description: Nvim Treesitter is a plugin that allows you to parse and query your code. It is used by many plugins to provide better syntax highlighting, indentation, and more.

title: Nvim Snippets
description: Nvim Snippets is a plugin that allows you to create snippets for your code. It is used by many plugins to provide better syntax highlighting, indentation, and more.

title: Vim Surround
description: Vim Surround is a plugin that allows you to surround text with quotes, brackets, and more. It is used by many plugins to provide better syntax highlighting, indentation, and more.
